content: lion brand pattern # 880 *ckc-hat pdf* skill level intermediate level 3 lion® cotton article #760 2 balls crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm gauge motifs are approx 2¾ inches across make 8 motifs for hat band join to form ring work hat from top down joining to hat band work brim to finish *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology *
